page.title: 11RECREATION SCRAPTOFT THURNBY
page.content: Where we live on TLE there are quite a few clubs.There is a BMX club where we can have races on our bikes.Quite a lot goes on at the community centre. There is one section especially for old folks and my grandad goes to it. It is called the Wednesday Club.At this club they cards and dominoes etc. They can have cups of tea and biscuits. My grandad is on the committee and they organise trps to the seaside for the old folks.Ithink that is nice. At Easter and in the summer there are play schemes, but I don't go there because older kids pick on you. Next to our school is the Boys Club, but that is rough as well.Mums can play Bingo at the centre,but dads usually spend their spare time at the pub. There is also a dog training club, so there is something for everyone.
